feed.title: Millenium Blades Wiki - Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos)

entry.title: Alliance (Core Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos))
entry.summary: DECK BOX | Ongoing: Whenever a player seated adjacent to you gains RP, put a +1 STAR Token on this card. | Score: Gain 2 RP for each +1 STAR Token on this card (max. 60 RP).
entry.content:
Alliance

Source Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos)
Set Millennium Blades
Cost $3
Card Type Core
Quantity
Star Rating 3⭐
Element -
Type Myth
DECK BOX | Ongoing: Whenever a player seated adjacent to you gains RP, put a +1 STAR Token on this card. | Score: Gain 2 RP for each +1 STAR Token on this card (max. 60 RP).
Source Symbol Collusion
References
Comments & Errata [Updated card in Collusion. Old source symbol/copyright: -/2016. Old card text follows.] DECK BOX | Ongoing: Whenever a player seated adjacent to you gains RP, put a +1 STAR Token on this card. This effect does not work during Scoring. | Score: Gain 4 RP for each +1 STAR Token on this card (max. 60 RP).
Copyright 2020
Count 1

entry.title: Raritti Sikarh (Character (Co-Op) Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos))
entry.summary: CO-OP DECKBUILDING POWER | Begin the game with all cards from the Elemental Gem Power and Master Fusion Gems sets in your binder. || CO-OP TOURNAMENT POWER | Once during the tournament, you may play two Singles into one slot as one card. The new card has the combined STAR of both cards, as well as both ELEMENTS, TYPES, SETS, RARITIES, names, and all effects of both cards.
entry.content:
Raritti Sikarh

Source Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos)
Set Raritti
Cost $0
Card Type Character (Co-Op)
Quantity
Star Rating 0⭐
Element -
Type -
CO-OP DECKBUILDING POWER | Begin the game with all cards from the Elemental Gem Power and Master Fusion Gems sets in your binder. || CO-OP TOURNAMENT POWER | Once during the tournament, you may play two Singles into one slot as one card. The new card has the combined STAR of both cards, as well as both ELEMENTS, TYPES, SETS, RARITIES, names, and all effects of both cards.
Source Symbol Collusion
References
Comments & Errata [Updated card in Collusion. Old source symbol/copyright: -/2016. Old card text follows.] CO-OP DECKBUILDING POWER | All players can fuse cards without using Sell Markers. | You begin the game with all 12 Fusion Gem Accessories in your binder. || CO-OP TOURNAMENT POWER | Once during the tournament, you may play two Singles into one slot as one card. The new card has the combined STAR of both cards, as well as both ELEMENTS, TYPES, SETS, RARITIES, names, and all effects of both cards.
Copyright 2020
Count 3

entry.title: Raritti Sikarh (Character Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos))
entry.summary: DECKBUILDING POWER | You can trade any number of cards in your binder for one card in the Aftermarket that matches the total STAR of the cards you traded. The cards you trade go to the Store Discard. You cannot trade for a card with one of your Sell Markers on it. || TOURNAMENT POWER | Once during the tournament, you may play two Singles into one slot as one card. The new card has the combined STAR of both cards, as well as both ELEMENTS, TYPES, SETS, RARITIES, names, and all effects of both cards.

entry.title: Shaffile DuCarte (Character (Co-Op) Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos))
entry.summary: CO-OP DECKBUILDING POWER | You can pay 1 Dollar to discard up to 4 cards from the top of the Store Deck to the store discard without looking at their faces. entry.title: Shaffile DuCarte (Character Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos))
entry.summary: DECKBUILDING POWER | You cannot buy cards from the Store. | Instead, you may pay 3 Dollars to pick up the top 3 cards of the Store Deck, keep one, place one on sale in the Aftermarket, and place the other in the store discard. || TOURNAMENT POWER | At the start of the Tournament and at the end of each of your turns, reveal cards from the top of the Store Deck until you reveal a Single, then put it on top of this card (place other revealed cards on the bottom of the Store Deck). You can play Singles on this card as if they were in your hand. When you do, gain 10 RP. After the tournament, any cards still on this card go to the Aftermarket.
entry.content:

entry.title: Shafille DuCarte (Pro Player Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos))
entry.summary: Play: Discard this card to your binder and name a SET. Reveal cards from the top of the Store Deck until you reveal a card of that SET, then play that card (if you do not find one, nothing happens). Shuffle the revealed cards and put them on the bottom of the deck.
entry.content:
Shafille DuCarte

Source Mini Expansion #3 (Fusion Chaos)
Set Antiquity
Cost $10
Card Type Pro Player
Quantity
Star Rating 9⭐
Element -
Type Dual Citizen/Pro
Play: Discard this card to your binder and name a SET. Reveal cards from the top of the Store Deck until you reveal a card of that SET, then play that card (if you do not find one, nothing happens). Shuffle the revealed cards and put them on the bottom of the deck.
Source Symbol -
References "Shuffle the Cards" name pun.
Comments & Errata Errata: Misspelling of "Shaffile" in the card name.
Copyright 2016
Count 1
